name: Broken Ace DEMO
description:
This land was where I sworn my oath. This land was where I protect, I fight, I cry, and I laugh. Now, this land, and it's people, turned against me. Turned against their very hero, and the protector that they used to admire with pride.

-Zurath Arellion

Follow Zurath, an exiled hero of Saxonia, in his attempt to escape and find a new home for himself. Follow the journey of an exiled hero and his new companions against a slew of inhumane people, barbaric monsters, and demons that orchestrates chaos.

A JRPG styled game that spans over multiple travel-able areas. This demo has a total content of 4 bossfights, 4 travel-able areas, and 4 main characters.

An entry of Devtober 2020. The product still in further development.
